info.title: Cohere Rerank API
info.description: Cohere Rerank API v1 — Re-rank a list of documents based on semantic relevance to a query.

post.description: Re-ranks a list of documents according to how relevant they are to the provided query. Returns a list of results including the original document index and the computed relevance score.

model.description: The reranking model to use. Example: `rerank-english-v3.0`.

query.description: The query used to compute semantic relevance for each document.

top_n.description: The number of highest-ranked results to return. If omitted, all documents are re-ranked.

documents.description: The list of documents to be re-ranked. For Mint compatibility, documents are represented as objects with flexible structure.

items.description: A document object. For convenience, plain text documents may be represented via the `text` field.

example.query: Organic skincare products for sensitive skin

documents.text: Organic skincare for sensitive skin with aloe vera and chamomile...
New makeup trends focus on bold colors and innovative techniques...
Bio-Hautpflege für empfindliche Haut mit Aloe Vera und Kamille...

results.description: The list of re-ranked documents ordered by relevance score.

index.description: The original index of the document in the input array.

relevance_score.description: A numeric score representing how relevant the document is to the query. Higher is more relevant.
